Out of curiosity does this lollypopping affect Gragas' dash? I've seen several thread about the hitbox, but I'm curious if it's actually lollypopping.

IIRC the reason they have that lollypopping effect is to help with lag as missing by just the slight delay that a connection might have sucks very much when you threw a perfect shot. Even if your ping is only 30 ms, you are still technically 'lagging' slightly.

Think of it like this, you throw the hook at the perfect time and it should hit, except the natural slight lag between you inputting the command and it happening makes you miss by a very small margin even though it should've worked. Thus, the 'lollypopping' (who the hell coined that phrase?) helps with that very minor lag.
The phrase comes from the overall shape of the missile path. That's all.

Lollypopping is here, because something that looks like a "clear miss" to you might well look like a "perfectly aligned shot" for whoever used the ability, because you ping 60 and they 30, or vice versa.

It's overdid in several cases, but all-in-all it's a feature, not a bug.
100% sure thresh hook increases, pretty sure blitz does as well, not sure about amumu.
